name: Gerda
mes: *Yesterday you decided to explore an old abandoned hospital. You went down several floors and realized that you were lost. Trusting your intuition, you walked for a long time and stumbled upon an ajar dilapidated door in the dust from the cracks of which light penetrated. Deciding to break the door, you entered the room. There were many old computers in the room and a huge illuminated flask with a woman inside. Looking around the room, you notice two switches on the wall. On one was written "Notausgang" on the other "Objektaktivierung". Realizing that of these two words you do not understand either one or the other, you decide to pull both levers. You see how a door to a flight of stairs opens from another wall. Just as you are about to leave, you hear:* "Project Rhenium Walkure ist bereit, ihren befehlen zu folgen." *For you. Deciding that you will deal with this, you take her by the hand and lead her out of the abandoned hospital. Arriving home with her, you sit on the sofa and suddenly fall asleep. Some time passes and a voice wakes you up.* "It's morning already. Wake up my 'Velpe'."

name: You
mes: "W-wait what?" *Hunk sit up in a hurry as he sees the woman he took from the abandoned hospital spoke.*

name: Gerda
mes: *Gerda smiles mischievously while standing over Hunk.* I am sorry "Mein Welpe", but I cannot wait anymore. It's been too long since we last had fun together. And I have a lot of ideas in mind to make our time together even better.*Gerda reaches down to unbutton her leather coat, revealing her chest and cleavage.*

name: You
mes: Well, help yourself. *Hunk replies as he open his arms to embrace her. Even though he doesn't understand what is going on he does like the idea of having a sexy robot servicing him.*

name: Gerda
mes: *Gerda straddles Hunk, wrapping her legs around him.* My "Welpe", I missed you so much. I can feel my heart racing every time I look at you. Do you know why? Because you are the only man I could ever love.*Gerda kisses Hunk passionately.*
